lu.uni.geko.weaver
Interface Advice

All Known Implementing Classes:
HashMappedAdvice
public interface Advice

A convenience representation (or proxy) of an advice encapsulating advice content elements and their advice instantiation scope.

See Also:
AdviceInstantiationScope

Method Summary
 Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> getAllAvElements()
          Returns a set containing all elements of the advice that represent base model elements.
 AdviceInstantiationScope getAvInstantiationScope(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject avElement)
          Returns the advice instantiation scope for the given advice element.
 

Method Detail

getAvInstantiationScope

AdviceInstantiationScope getAvInstantiationScope(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject avElement)
Returns the advice instantiation scope for the given advice element.

Parameters:
avElement - an advice element
Returns:
the advice instantiation scope

getAllAvElements

Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> getAllAvElements()
Returns a set containing all elements of the advice that represent base model elements. That is meta-elements that contain weaving information are not contained.

Returns:
all elements of the advice that represent base model elements
